mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into step_change_log (userId, stepNum, jiaChenStep, rewardStep, coinNum, createTime) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jiachenstep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rewardsteps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coinnum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update step_change_log set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stepNum = #{stepnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiaChenStep = #{jiachenstep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rewardStep = #{rewardstep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coinNum = #{coinnum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, stepNum, jiaChenStep, rewardStep, coinNum, createTime from step_change_log
select id, userId, stepNum, jiaChenStep, rewardStep, coinNum, createTime from step_change_log where userId = #{arg0} AND (createTime BETWEEN #{arg1} AND #{arg2})
